body.p: {{tp15|Your task is to sort the items from the list into several groups. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli34|Click an item in the list. It will be highlighted.}}
{{tli35|Hold your left mouse button down and drag the item to an empty space in the correct group.}}
{{tli37|The item will be moved into the chosen group and will be deactivated in the list.}}

body.p: {{tp16|To recall the item from the group back to list, click on it.}}
